name: Carradine "In Case I Lose It, We Both Have It" LP
description:
Carradine "In Case I Lose It, We Both Have It" 12"
Pressed At Archer Vinyl

Side A
Slack Rock
Night Stand
The Gestalt
Opinion Shelter
Mathematica 2021

Side B
Rose Garden
Steel Concrete & Boredom
Bleeding Out
Post Cards
Topspin

Recorded And Mixed At Brooksfield Gentlemen's Club, Detroit, MI By Jonathan Weier
Produced By Jonathan Weier & Carradine
Mastered By Bahama Jon At Hawaiian Tropic's Studio
Artwork By Chris Everhart For The Silent Giants
